page.title: 20WARREN FARM IN THE W WIGHT
page.content: The present tenent of Warren Farm is Mr.John Osman.On his farm he has a dairy.A dairy is one that keeps cows and sells their milk locally in the Totland area.For years the farm has been owned by the Ward family and is known as part of the Ward estate.Years ago the Ward estate owned quite a lot of land in Freshwater,Totland and Alum Bay.Quite a lot of it has been built over the last 30yrs.Before Mr.Osman moved to Warren it was in the Dimmick family,some still living in Totland today.Mr.George Dimmick used to go round Totland in a horse drawn cart, known as a milk float,selling his milk,butter,cream and eggs to the local people.Today a lot of the area has been cleared of gorse and bracken and the land reclaimed for agricultural use. John Hayles 9 years
